item.title: Python + Transmission daemon = Download easily your favorite TV Show
item.description: This post is about my last project : my TV Show Manager. I decided to start it because I wanted something really simple to download my favorite TV Shows. In this post, I’ll explain step by step how to reproduce it at home. Basically, with this tutorial you’ll set up your Raspberry box by : Installing / set-uping transmission-daemon Getting one of my latest project TVShowManager that uses my EZTV Python API.
